org.scec.sha.magdist
Class DiscreteMagFreqDist

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.scec.data.function.EvenlyDiscretizedFunc
        |
        +--org.scec.sha.magdist.DiscreteMagFreqDist
All Implemented Interfaces:
DiscretizedFuncAPI, MagFreqDistAPI, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
GaussianMagFreqDist, GR_MagFreqDist, SingleMagFreqDist, SummedMagFreqDist
public abstract class DiscreteMagFreqDist
extends EvenlyDiscretizedFunc
implements MagFreqDistAPI

Title: DiscreteMagFreqDist
Description: This abstract class represents the rate of earthquakes (per year) as a function of magnitude (not a cumulative distribution). Each subclass with have additional constructors.
Copyright: Copyright (c) 2001
Company:
